task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)
task.shareWithOrganizationDescription: Only members of your organization can access
task.sharePubliclyDescription: Anyone with the link can access
task.connectToCloudDescription: Sign in to Mojo Code Cloud to share tasks

about: Generate, refactor, and debug code with AI assistance.
onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty.

boomerangTasks.title: Task Orchestration
boomerangTasks.description: Split tasks into smaller, manageable parts

stickyModels.title: Sticky Models
stickyModels.description: Each mode remembers your last used model

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Allow the AI to solve problems by browsing the web, running commands, and more

customizableModes.title: Customizable Modes
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas with their own behaviors and assigned models

modeSelector.title: Modes
modeSelector.description: Specialized personas that tailor Mojo's behavior.

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Mojo wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Mojo wants to read this file:

fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: Mojo wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:

fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: Mojo wants to search and replace in this file:
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: Mojo performed search and replace on this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: Mojo wants to insert content into this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: Mojo wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: Mojo wants to append content to the end of this file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Mojo wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Mojo viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: Mojo wants to view the top level files in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: Mojo viewed the top level files in this directory (outside workspace):

directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Mojo recursively viewed all files in this directory:

directoryOperations.didViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: Mojo recursively viewed all files in this directory (outside workspace):

directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: Mojo viewed source code definition names used in this directory:

directoryOperations.didViewDefinitionsOutsideWorkspace: Mojo viewed source code definition names used in this directory (outside workspace):

directoryOperations.wantsToSearchOutsideWorkspace: Mojo wants to search this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}:
directoryOperations.didSearchOutsideWorkspace: Mojo searched this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}:

codebaseSearch.wantsToSearch: Mojo wants to search the codebase for {{query}}:
codebaseSearch.wantsToSearchWithPath: Mojo wants to search the codebase for {{query}} in {{path}}:

commandExecution.commandManagementDescription: Manage command permissions: Click ✓ to allow auto-execution, ✗ to deny execution. Patterns can be toggled on/off or removed from lists. <settingsLink>View all settings</settingsLink>

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Mojo wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Mojo wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: Mojo wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Mojo wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Mojo wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Mojo wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows Mojo Code to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.
autoApprove.selectOptionsFirst: Select at least one option below to enable auto-approval

announcement.title: 🎉 Mojo Code {{version}} Released
announcement.description: Mojo Code {{version}} brings powerful new features and significant improvements to enhance your development workflow.
announcement.feature1: <bold>Message Queueing</bold>: Queue multiple messages while Mojo is working, allowing you to continue planning your workflow without interruption.
announcement.feature2: <bold>Custom Slash Commands</bold>: Create personalized slash commands for quick access to frequently used prompts and workflows, with full UI management.
announcement.feature3: <bold>Enhanced Gemini Tools</bold>: New URL context and Google Search grounding capabilities provide Gemini models with real-time web information and enhanced research abilities.
announcement.detailsDiscussLinks: Get more details and discuss in <discordLink>Discord</discordLink> and <redditLink>Reddit</redditLink> 🚀

followUpSuggest.copyToInput: Copy to input (same as shift + click)

browser.MojoWantsToUse: Mojo wants to use the browser:

systemPromptWarning: WARNING: Custom system prompt override active. This can severely break functionality and cause unpredictable behavior.
profileViolationWarning: The current profile isn't compatible with your organization's settings

shellIntegration.title: Command Execution Warning
shellIntegration.description: Your command is being executed without VSCode terminal shell integration. To suppress this warning you can disable shell integration in the Terminal section of the Mojo Code settings or troubleshoot VSCode terminal integration using the link below.
shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Click here for shell integration documentation.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Request Limit Reached
autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: Mojo has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API request(s). Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?

autoApprovedCostLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Cost Limit Reached
autoApprovedCostLimitReached.description: Mojo has reached the auto-approved cost limit of ${{count}}. Would you like to reset the cost and proceed with the task?

versionIndicator.ariaLabel: Version {{version}} - Click to view release notes

slashCommands.title: Slash Commands
slashCommands.description: Create custom slash commands for quick access to frequently used prompts and workflows. <DocsLink>Docs</DocsLink>

deleteDialog.title: Delete Command
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the command "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
